name: Meteorite: Mind relaxing games
description:
The game is quite addicting and enjoyable,
it is a mixture of puzzles with ball ricochet element, that develops logic thinking and trains the brain.

Discover for free one of the best logic puzzles and puzzle apps.

Experiment this unique addicting game which will improve your focus and concentration ability and increase your skillz IQ. Patterns is also a great time killing game.

The angle of incidence is equal to the angle of reflection.

How to play
The rule is simple and logic:
Rotate different blocks to make the ball (meteorite) bounce and send the ball in the right direction. It is somewhat reminiscent of billiards with ricochet, but with puzzle elements. Remember that the must hit all the stars on the way to its destination.

Addicting the puzzles are loved by all fans of brain games for adults, logic puzzles, mind benders. They practice their logical thinking with it and IQ.

Relax: No time limit, and moves are free. Mind are designed to relax you. The levels are a good way to kill time and stimulate your reasoning at the same time.
